summary: The Technical Assistance for Health Grants Act (HR 5386) amends Section 2008 of the Social Security Act to provide technical assistance to entities receiving grants under the health profession opportunity grant program. This includes assistance with applications, project administration, and specific support for Indian tribes, territories, and demonstration projects. The bill mandates peer technical assistance conferences and requires a report to Congress. It allocates $15 million for fiscal year 2026 to support these technical assistance efforts and takes effect October 1, 2025.
